text:
2. Read @README.md, @codex.log, @gemini.log for understanding project and previous polishing.
3. @setup_local_services.sh install, start and check services.
4. llama, whisperx models in /workspace/packages/ corresponding folders. Input video files in: /workspace/package either.
5. Video process need LR-ASR repo: https://github.com/Junhua-Liao/LR-ASD.git, need to refer to the README or logs download dependencies/packages in advance.
6. Project run in vast.ai instance:
	RTX 3060 CUDA: 12.6 VRAM: 12GB
	CPU:XEON E5 1660 V3
	RAM: 26GB
	DISK: 32GB OR 50GB

7. Run video pipeline process, name workflows, input/output files with prefix . Concern of working on GPU.
8. Keep existed workflows as references , terminate one if it's in idle or block status.
8. There is same issue mention in @README.md, read and fix no output problem.
Download small whisper model in /workspace/packages/models/whisper and run pipeline again.
Write a test script for identify_moments activity to check LLM models/weights logic.
Run test with video in MinIO.
Dump transcript into JSON file and save in MinIO.
Run pipeline test, but skip process_clips, try to output clips transcripts instead. output in text format.
Attach start and end time into clips' transcripts. Keep workflow tasks in Temporal.
Yes, run in Temporal task queue.
Rerun transcription pipeline test carry on Temporal.
Append this explian into README.md and other operations in this session.
where did you push, please roll back and push to my github: https://github.com/jianshelu/ai-podcast-clipper-local.git
